name: The Factory Interactive
description:
We live in a digital world bombarded by emails, tweets, blogs, pop-ups, banners, billboards, television ads and radio shout outs - each one of them screaming for our attention. It is a new era of mass communication and social engagement where your customers connect, comment, post, check-in, share and discuss everything in realtime...including your brand.
 
The Factory Interactive give's personality to product, which results in a stronger, more effective brand. We look to the horizon for new technological innovations & advancements that will provide our clients the competitive advantage needed in today’s global marketplace. We continually challenge ourselves in order to remain fresh, creative, and knowledgeable of the mediums that have become a part of our daily routines. We help to define the web.
READ MORE...
